name: Word Planet!
description:
Words can be vertical, horizontal and diagonal. Swipe your fingers over the letters to solve the puzzle and clear the stage! As you play, the difficulty level increases along with your skills. Discover new planets as you complete levels! Very addictive and relaxing!

Features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay.
- Discover new planets.
- No time limit, no pressure.
- Daily Rewards.
- NO Internet connection required!
- Compete with your friends over leaderboard.
- Beautiful, clean and elegant design.

Thank you for playing Word Planet!
